abstract: Kit Eaton AppSmart column highlights apps to help people with their new year's resolutions of saving money, getting in shape, losing weight and more.
lead_paragraph: From watching your finances to learning Portuguese, apps can lend a hand. One app can monitor progress on all your new year’s intentions.

headline.main: Video Feature: Apps for Keeping New Year’s Resolutions
headline.print_headline: Keeping New Year’s Resolutions Alive, a Little Longer

snippet: From watching your finances to learning Portuguese, apps can lend a hand. One app can monitor progress on all your new year’s intentions.
